column1: European and International Business Management - MSc
column3: Faculty of Management, Law and Social Sciences
column5: The MSc European and International Business Management is unique in the UK. You’ll live and study in three different European countries, giving you a truly international perspective on management.It is delivered in partnership with two other centres of excellence:Deusto Business School at the Universidad de Deusto, Bilbao, SpainAudencia Business School, Nantes, FranceThe programme is taught in three languages: Spanish, French and English. You will spend the first term in Spain or France, the second in France or Spain, and the third at the School of Management in Bradford. You spend the final 12 weeks of the course on work placement or writing a report.
